checkpoints.description: A finetuned SDXL Turbo model, fast and more stunning results.

checkpoints.name: Pony Diffusion V6 XL
checkpoints.description: Pony Diffusion V6 is a versatile SDXL finetune capable of producing stunning SFW and NSFW visuals of various anthro, feral, or humanoids species and their interactions based on simple natural language prompts.

settings.negative_prompt: low-res, bad anatomy, bad hands, text, error, missing xfingers, extra digit, fewer digits, cropped, worst quality, xlow quality, normal quality, jpeg artifacts, signature, xwatermark, username, blurry, artist name,(deformed, xdistorted, disfigured:1.3), poorly drawn, bad anatomy, xwrong anatomy, extra limb, missing limb, floating limbs, x(mutated hands and fingers:1.4), disconnected limbs, xmutation, mutated, ugly, disgusting, blurry, amputation

loras.name: The Shorekeeper / Wuthering Waves
loras.description:
The Shorekeeper is a character from wuthering waves.
These can be some helpful triggerwords:
ohwx, 1girl, solo, blue_hair, purple_eyes, breasts, hair_between_eyes, long_hair, cleavage, parted_lips, large_breasts, medium_hair, medium_breasts, nail_polish, thighs, blue_nails, jewelry, dress, bug, butterfly, veil, white_dress, blue_butterfly, flower, sleeveless, white_veil, bare_shoulders, alternate_costume, sleeveless_dress, choker, hood, armlet, blue_dress

loras.name: Bubble Trouble Amber
loras.description: A Brawl Stars Bubble Trouble Amber Lora.
loras.positive_prompt: boamber,1 girl, multicolored hair, long hair,purple tank top,belt, yellow knee pads, shorts ,skirt, shorts under skirt, visor cap, pink headwear,fingerless gloves,white Arm band,

checkpoints.name: Abyss Orange Mix 3 (AOM3)
checkpoints.description: AOM3 can generate illustrations with very realistic textures and can generate a wide variety of content. There are also three variant models based on the AOM3 that have been adjusted to a unique illustration style. These models will help you to express your ideas more clearly.

settings.positive_prompt: masterpiece, best quality, ultra-detailed, illustration, texture, detail, realism, depth, perspective, composition, color, light, shadow, tone, contrast, naturalistic, figurative, representational, impressionistic, expressionistic
settings.negative_prompt: (worst quality, low quality:1.4), (realistic, lip, nose, tooth, rouge, lipstick, eyeshadow:1.0), (dusty sunbeams:1.0),, (abs, muscular, rib:1.0), (depth of field, bokeh, blurry:1.4), (greyscale, monochrome:1.0), text, title, logo, signature,watermark,

checkpoints.name: ReV Animated V2 Rebirth
checkpoints.description:
The model has the ability to create 2.5D like image generations.
These are some included styles for this model: fantasy, anime, semi-realistic, decent landscape.
This model likes: ((best quality)), ((masterpiece)), (detailed) in beginning of prompt if you want anime-2.5D type

settings.positive_prompt: masterpiece, best quality, ultra-detailed, illustration, connection, harmony, balance, texture, detail, realism, depth, perspective, composition, color, light, shadow, reflection, refraction, tone, contrast, foreground, middle ground, background, naturalistic, figurative, representational, impressionistic, expressionistic, abstract, innovative, experimental, unique
settings.negative_prompt: EasyNegative, Deep Negative, bad_prompt_version2, bad-artist, bad-artist-anime, bad-quality

checkpoints.name: KM Mix Experiment Stage 1 Cute Style 1
checkpoints.description: This model generates cute anime characters.

settings.negative_prompt: (low quality,worst quality:1.2),poorly drawn,(poorly drawn face),(deformed,disfigured),(bad anatomy,wrong anatomy),bextra lim,missing lim,floating lim,disconnected lim,(mutated hands and fingers),ugly|fingernails,blurry,(signature|watermark|text),(mutant feet and toes),Mix the feet together,Mixed limbs,

loras.name: Real Dragons
loras.description:
You can expect awe-inspiring dragon flames, powerful dragon strength, unparalleled dragon vision, and acute dragon perception, among other characteristics.
These can be some helpful triggerwords:
dragon_real,flame
